description:
The Trampery Wood Green is host to 50 artists currently occupying studios in the building. At our open day event you will have the opportunity to come and see their work and their workspaces!
As part of the open day we will activate the space by hosting multiple activities in the lounge throughout the event. For this we are planning on having an agenda of skill-sharing, music and food and drinks.

events.name: Drop in: Open Studio Event
events.notes: A full day of open studio activities!

events.name: Drop in: Open Studio Event
events.notes: A full day of Open Studio Event!

factsheet.heading: Open Studio at 40 Cumberland road
paragraphs: Join us for a weekend of activities and art at 40 Cumberland road, where nearly 50 artists occupy studios in the building. They are excited to welcome you to their space and show you their work!

As you wander around the building and meet our artists, you are welcome to join us for a taster workshop during the day, and an open mic music event in the evening, which is free for the public to join!

name: The Trampery Wood Green
